sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function CartItem({ item, value }) { const { id, title, img, price, total, count, company } = item; const { decrement, increment, removeItem } = value; return (
{title}
Company: {company}
${price}
decrement(id)}> -
increment(id)}> +
removeItem(id)}>
${total} ); }
